trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There was one other sighting in Scottsdale on or around May 18th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsbright light north Scottsdale, just above mountain to the east. visible until sunrise, sun came up next to it, slightly south. stationary for an hour whitnessed by five of us. I first noticed it at 5am pointed it out to the others when I got to work. oldie but to me a goodie morning 1998 Aril 29th cigar shaped object north northeast of Scottsdale observed for nearly three hours estimated distance 78 miles, altitude 100,000 ft size at least one mile in length (of course real rough calculations) reported it to Peter in Seattle. walt
